statements: SELECT * FROM student_dietary_preferences WHERE age > 20
SELECT student_name, age FROM student_dietary_preferences ORDER BY age DESC
SELECT student_name, dietary_preferences FROM student_dietary_preferences WHERE age < 25
SELECT * FROM student_dietary_preferences WHERE dietary_restrictions IS NULL
SELECT student_name, dietary_restrictions FROM student_dietary_preferences WHERE student_id = 3
SELECT student_name, age, dietary_preferences FROM student_dietary_preferences WHERE age > 20
SELECT * FROM student_dietary_preferences WHERE dietary_restrictions LIKE '%vegan%'
SELECT student_id, student_name, age FROM student_dietary_preferences ORDER BY age DESC
SELECT student_name, dietary_preferences FROM student_dietary_preferences WHERE dietary_restrictions IS NULL
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_students FROM student_dietary_preferences
SELECT * FROM students;
SELECT student_name, dietary_preferences FROM students;
SELECT student_id, student_name FROM students ORDER BY student_name ASC;
SELECT student_name FROM students WHERE student_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM restrictions WHERE restriction_type = 'Vegetarian';
SELECT * FROM students WHERE student_id = 1;
SELECT student_name, dietary_preferences FROM students WHERE student_name LIKE 'A%';
SELECT student_id, student_name, dietary_preferences FROM students ORDER BY student_id DESC;
SELECT student_id, student_name, r.restriction_type FROM students s JOIN restrictions r ON s.student_id = r.student_id WHERE r.restriction_type = 'Vegetarian';
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_students FROM students;
SELECT * FROM Students;
SELECT name, age FROM Students WHERE age > 18;
SELECT student_id, meal_preference FROM Preferences WHERE meal_preference = 'Vegetarian';
SELECT * FROM Restrictions ORDER BY restriction_id DESC;
SELECT student_id, restriction_description FROM Restrictions WHERE restriction_type = 'Medical' OR restriction_type = 'Dietary';
SELECT * FROM Students;
SELECT name, age FROM Students WHERE age > 20 ORDER BY name DESC;

SELECT s.name, p.meal_preference, r.restriction_type FROM Students s INNER JOIN Preferences p ON s.student_id = p.student_id INNER JOIN Restrictions r ON s.student_id = r.student_id WHERE p.meal_preference = 'Vegetarian' AND r.restriction_type = 'Dairy-Free';
SELECT student_id, meal_preference FROM Preferences WHERE allergies IS NULL OR allergies = '';
SELECT * FROM Preferences WHERE meal_preference IN ('Vegan', 'Gluten-Free') ORDER BY student_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM Students;
SELECT student_name, dietary_preferences FROM Students WHERE student_id = '1';
SELECT class_name, teacher_id FROM Classes WHERE age_group = 'Elementary';
SELECT student_id, class_id FROM Student_Class ORDER BY student_id DESC;
SELECT teacher_name, email FROM Teachers ORDER BY teacher_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM Students;
SELECT student_id, student_name, dietary_preferences FROM Students WHERE dietary_restrictions IS NOT NULL;
SELECT class_id, class_name, teacher_id, age_group FROM Classes ORDER BY age_group DESC;
SELECT student_name, teacher_name FROM Students JOIN Student_Class ON Students.student_id = Student_Class.student_id JOIN Classes ON Student_Class.class_id = Classes.class_id;
SELECT student_name, dietary_preferences FROM Students LEFT JOIN Student_Class ON Students.student_id = Student_Class.student_id WHERE Student_Class.class_id IS NULL;
SELECT * FROM Students;
SELECT student_name, date_of_birth FROM Students WHERE dietary_preference='Vegetarian';
SELECT class_name, teacher_name FROM Classes JOIN Teachers ON Classes.teacher_id = Teachers.teacher_id;

SELECT student_id, student_name, parent_name FROM Students JOIN Student_Parent_Relationship ON Students.student_id = Student_Parent_Relationship.student_id JOIN Parents ON Student_Parent_Relationship.parent_id = Parents.parent_id;
SELECT class_name, start_date, end_date FROM Classes WHERE start_date < '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM Students;
SELECT student_name, date_of_birth FROM Students ORDER BY date_of_birth DESC;
SELECT student_name, dietary_preference FROM Students WHERE dietary_preference='Vegetarian';
SELECT class_name, start_date, end_date FROM Classes WHERE start_date >= '2022-01-01';

SELECT Students.student_name, Parents.parent_name FROM Students INNER JOIN Student_Parent_Relationship ON Students.student_id = Student_Parent_Relationship.student_id INNER JOIN Parents ON Student_Parent_Relationship.parent_id = Parents.parent_id;
